details.arguments: -ksp_monitor -ksp_atol 1.e-11 -ksp_rtol 1.e-3 -ksp_type gmres -ksp_gmres_restart 30 -ksp_pc_side right -pc_type asm -pc_asm_type restrict -pc_asm_overlap 2 -sub_ksp_type preonly -sub_pc_type ilu -ksp_converged_reason -da_grid_x 256 -da_grid_y 256 -fd 0 -eps 0.025 -Length 128 -endT 3200 -Tmin 0.01 -Tmax 20 -interP 100 -sub_pc_factor_levels 2
